activities.name: GetFiles
activities.description: Get files to be processed from cosmos.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
a.filepath(1) as [filename], 
a.filepath() as [filepath]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwQueryOperation/Parquet/*.0000000.parquet',FORMAT = 'PARQUET')
as [a]
WHERE    
datediff(day,cast(a.filepath(1) as datetime), convert(date,getutcdate())) <= @{pipeline().parameters.ParameterNumberOfDays}

activities.description: Iterates through the cosmos files of interest.

activities.name: ProcessAvgMaxDailyActivity
activities.description: Process one avg/max daily activity stream.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
with endpointsTotal as
(
SELECT DISTINCT
	   substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
	   [SubscriptionId_DT_String] AS [SubscriptionId], 
       [LogicalServerName_DT_String]  AS [Endpoint],
	   CAST([originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] as date) as [currentDay]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
       'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwConfigurations/Parquet/@{item().filename}.0000000.parquet',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200),
	[originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] datetime2
)
  AS [a]
WHERE [AppTypeName_DT_String] = 'Worker.VDW.Frontend' and [ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%'
),
activeEndpoints as
(
SELECT DISTINCT
	substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
	[SubscriptionId_DT_String] AS [SubscriptionId], 
    [LogicalServerName_DT_String] AS [Endpoint],
	CAST([originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] as date) as [currentDay],
	DATEPART(hour,originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime) AS [currentHour]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
       '@{item().filepath}',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200),
	[originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] datetime2,
	[eventName_DT_String] varchar(200)
)
	AS [b]
WHERE [eventName_DT_String] = 'vdw_distributed_computation_rpc' and [ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%'
),
activeEndpointsSummarized as
(
SELECT Region,SubscriptionId,Endpoint,currentDay,count(distinct currentHour) as hoursActive
FROM activeEndpoints
GROUP BY Region,SubscriptionId,Endpoint,currentDay
),
joined_data as
(
select 
	endpointsTotal.Region as TotalRegion,
	endpointsTotal.Endpoint as TotalEndpoint,
	endpointsTotal.currentDay as TotalCurrentDay,
	endpointsTotal.SubscriptionId as TotalSubscriptionId,
	activeEndpointsSummarized.Region as ActiveRegion,
	activeEndpointsSummarized.Endpoint as ActiveEndpoint,
	activeEndpointsSummarized.currentDay as ActiveCurrentDay,
	activeEndpointsSummarized.SubscriptionId as ActiveSubscriptionId,
	activeEndpointsSummarized.hoursActive as hoursActive
from endpointsTotal 
full outer join activeEndpointsSummarized 
on endpointsTotal.Region = activeEndpointsSummarized.Region and endpointsTotal.SubscriptionId = activeEndpointsSummarized.SubscriptionId and endpointsTotal.Endpoint = activeEndpointsSummarized.Endpoint and endpointsTotal.currentDay = activeEndpointsSummarized.currentDay
)
select 
	isnull(TotalRegion,ActiveRegion) as Region,
	isnull(TotalEndpoint,ActiveEndpoint) as Endpoint,
	isnull(TotalSubscriptionId,ActiveSubscriptionId) as SubscriptionId,
	isnull(TotalCurrentDay,ActiveCurrentDay) as currentDay,
	hoursActive = iif(hoursActive is NULL,0,hoursActive)
from joined_data
